channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: After a slew of setbacks, Swedish EV champion Northvolt is winding down part of its U.S. operations as it reevaluates its business
item.description: Northvolt is a pioneer in its own right. But delays and limping EV demand, have hurt its business.

item.title: Eli Lilly's weight loss drug slashes the risk of developing diabetes in long-term trial
item.description: The late-stage trial on tirzepatide also found that patients experienced sustained weight loss over the roughly three-year treatment period.

item.title: Lowe's lowers sales outlook, cites pressure on big-ticket spending
These boom-and-bust tech cycles show that if AI investment wanes, the recovery will be quick
item.description: Overinvestment in AI has the potential to lead to another market downfall if the products that come to market aren’t as cutting-edge as anticipated.

item.title: How the Inflation Reduction Act sparked a manufacturing and clean energy boom in the U.S.
item.description: The IRA has had a transformative impact on U.S. manufacturing, according to the Rhodium Group.

item.title: American workers haven’t been this worried about losing their jobs in a decade
There are only 15 people whose wealth is greater than $100 billion (and they’d be richer if they weren’t giving it away)
item.description: LVMH’s Bernard Arnault remains in the $100 billion club despite a stock decline removing more than $10 billion from his net worth overnight.

item.title: Lowe's cuts full-year outlook as it expects home improvement sales to weaken
item.description: Lowe's said customers took on fewer discretionary home projects and unfavorable weather hurt sales of outdoor and seasonal items.

item.title: Harris blasts Trump’s tariffs, as he hits back over how she'll fund proposals
TSMC breaks ground on €10 billion factory in Germany amid growing China-Taiwan tensions
item.description: Germany is fronting €5 billion in subsidies to help construct the Dresden fab with TSMC.

item.title: European Union slashes planned tariffs on China-made Tesla EVs, other Chinese firms
item.description: The European Union on Tuesday said a planned tariff on Tesla vehicles being imported from China would be cut to 9% from 20.8%.

item.title: Kroger takes aim at FTC’s in-house judges amid Albertsons merger challenge
Climate change amplified storm that sank British tycoon’s superyacht—with expert predicting more catastrophes in Italy
item.description: British-flagged yacht the 'Bayesian', owned by Mike Lynch, capsized and sunk off the coast of Sicily on Monday.

item.title: Tuesday analyst calls: There's strong upside ahead for Eli Lilly, Vista Energy and AMD
item.description: This is CNBC Pro's live coverage of Tuesday analyst calls and Wall Street chatter.

item.title: Nvidia’s stock is up 30% from August lows. Earnings could further its momentum.
